title: MGC 004 - The New Mutants (1982|Digital|Minutemen-FactorX)
description:
This was the original graphic novel that launched the ongoing series, written by the incomparable Chris Claremont. This MGC introduced the major new characters, their backgrounds and histories and the manifestation of their mutant powers, and serves as a critical entry point to the expanded X-Men universe.

This is the newly released digital copy of the classic, by Minutemen-FactorX. Thanks to them for their efforts; please seed and enjoy! :-)
